member.name: M:Microsoft.Data.Tools.Sql.BatchParser.BatchParser.RaiseScriptError(System.String,Microsoft.Data.Tools.Sql.BatchParser.ScriptMessageType)
member.summary: Called when the script parsing has errors/warnings

member.name: M:Microsoft.Data.Tools.Sql.BatchParser.Lexer.AcceptEscapableQuotedText(System.Char)
member.summary: This method reads ahead until the closingChar is found. When closingChar is found, the next character is checked. If it's the same as closingChar, the character is escaped and the method resumes looking for a non-escaped closingChar.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Data.Tools.Sql.BatchParser.Lexer.AcceptQuotedText(System.Char)
member.summary: This method reads ahead until the closingChar is found. This method does not allow for escaping of the closingChar.
